String.string: We shouldn't have to worry about the Scions of Lok anymore.
Enter the Cultists' Refuge and speak with Jelena. [[You must select Cultists' Refuge (Solo) through {@LinkCreature:225#1023#Runha} to advance this quest.]
Activate the {@linkcreature:3003#1008#Eastern Wardstone} in the northern room to open the gate to the eastern sector. Find {@linkcreature:3003#1023#Davina}.
Activate the {@linkcreature:3003#1011#Western Wardstone} and open the western sector entrance. [Select 'Look at the crest.' on the Western Wardstone to open the entrance.]
Activate the Western Wardstone, then return to Jelena in the central hallway.
Western Sector of the Cultists' Refuge
That woman looks suspicious. Interrogate her.
Scout the western sector and find High Priestess Akia.
Eliminate High Priestess Akia and Terkasia.
Use the explosives to destroy Samael's Soul Stone.
